featured.text: Firstborns, under normal circumstances, are usually the most strongly motivated toward achievement.
We react strongly—and suspiciously—to fast talk.
People may choose a name because they are strongly 38 a character in a book or a television series; they may also adopt names of famous people or their favorite actors and actresses.

definition.en_def: In a powerful or intense manner.
definition.example: She strongly believes in the importance of education.
